Title: Vanguard-Hunters
Legend: Vanguard-Hunters thrive when hunting their quarry through the most hostile environments. Carrying astral compasses to uncover hidden paths from which to strike, the daring exploits of these warriors has changed the course of many wars.

PitchBattleProfile.Notes: Battleline in an Astral Templars army

Intro: Each model in a Vanguard-Hunters unit is armed with a Boltstorm Pistol and Stormwrought Weapon. 1 in every 5 models can carry an Astral Compass.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Vanguard Angelos Conclave • Godsmaw’s Vanguard

Rules.Name: Champion
Rules.Rule: CHAMPION: 1 model in this unit can be a Hunter-Prime. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s Boltstorm Pistol and Stormwrought Weapon.

Rules.Name: Astral Compass
Rules.Fluff: The astral compass shows the best route to take in order to strike the foe.
Rules.Rule: If this unit includes any models carrying Astral Compasses, at the start of your movement phase, instead of making a normal move, you can say that this unit will navigate the winds aetheric. If you do so, remove this unit from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield wholly within 6" of the battlefield edge and more than 9" from all enemy units.
